subject: Detect and eliminate errors that are slowing down your PC
body:
How many error files are slowing you down?


 
Find and eliminate harmful PC errors.
Restore your PC to its maximum performance.
Stabilize your Windows operating system.
Fast and easy to use for beginners and experts.
Runs on all new and older Windows machines.





Every month since you first took your PC out of the box, 
it's gotten slower and slower. For most people, that's because your Windows registry 
has become filled with obsolete and redundant information. This prevents your 
machine from being as fast as it could be. Whether you're a beginner or expert 
user, run PC SpeedScan Pro today to detect hundreds of useless 
files and errors that may be slowing down your PC.

Once you use PC SpeedScan Pro to fix your computer, you'll be amazed at how much faster and more stable it makes it.
 You'll get that "brand new PC" feeling all over again!

Find out how many errors are slowing down your PC -
 (FREE Scan)
Real life success story from an Ascentive customer.
"Thank you so much for making these products. I thought my desk top was crashing. It would start, then shut it self off. Then it would not reboot again. I thought I was going to have to buy a new computer, or have to hire someone to come and look at it, or take it somewhere to be looked at. With a simple click and down load, and then scan to see what was wrong with the computer. IT is RUNNING like BRAND NEW. And this computer gets a lot of heavy use, and I have had it since 2001, so to have it running better then ever is so wonderful. This is a GREAT value.. and easy to use. I am going to tell all my friends and family about Ascentive software."
Kathy E Pierce of NH
Whether your PC is misbehaving or just needs a regular tune-up, PC SpeedScan will boost your system's performance in just a few minutes.
